KnowledgeBase.Title: isInteger
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector Void FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Pair List Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean

Function.Description: The isInteger function returns true if the specified argument is an Integer; otherwise, false is returned.

Brief.Overview: The isInteger function returns true if the specified argument {obj} is an Integer; otherwise, false is returned.
Brief.Usage: The isInteger function is used to determine if an object is an Integer.

Argument.Name: obj
Argument.AISTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector Void FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Pair List Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean

Syntax.Return: Returns true if the object is an Integer, false is returned otherwise
